images.description: Gameplay screenshot: Directions for the game are shown below the board.

Gameplay screenshot: After clicking on a piece, you must move that piece. Hovering over valid tiles to move the piece to, will cause the tile to turn green. Invalid tiles will turn red. Tiles will turn yellow if the move would take an enemy piece. If there are no valid moves for a piece, it is not selectable in the first place.
